file.name: product-api-spec.yaml
file.content:
# This is a file maintained by the rhsm-subscription project that describes
# a portion of the Red Hat IT Products API
openapi: "3.0.2"
info:
  title: "product-api"
  description: "Third-party specification for Subscription API"
  version: 1.0.0

paths:
  /products/{sku}/tree:
    get:
      summary: "Get SKU parent/child hierarchy"
      operationId: "getProductTree"
      tags:
        - product
      parameters:
        - name: sku
          required: true
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: attributes
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
      responses:
        default:
          description: "default response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/RESTProductTree"
  /engproducts/sku={sku}:
    description: "Get Engineering Products for one or more SKUs, comma delimited."
    get:
      summary: "GET Engineering Products associated with SKUs"
      operationId: "getEngineeringProductsForSkus"
      tags:
        - product
      parameters:
        - name: "sku"
          required: true
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        default:
          description: "default response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/EngineeringProductMap"
components:
  schemas:
    AttributeValue:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        value:
          type: string
    OperationalProduct:
      type: object
      properties:
        sku:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        attributes:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/AttributeValue"
        roles:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        engineeringProductOids:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
    RESTParentChild:
      type: object
      properties:
        child:
          type: string
    RESTProductTree:
      type: object
      properties:
        products:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/OperationalProduct"
        parentMap:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/RESTParentChild"
    EngineeringProduct:
      type: object
      properties:
        oid:
          type: integer
          # Originally spec'ed as int64, but no engOids get above even int16
          format: int32
    EngineeringProducts:
      type: object
      properties:
        engProducts:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/EngineeringProduct"
    EngineeringProductMap:
      type: object
      properties:
        entries:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/SkuEngProduct"
    SkuEngProduct:
      type: object
      properties:
        sku:
          type: string
        engProducts:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/EngineeringProducts"
